knimeNode.name: HiLite Filter
knimeNode.shortDescription: Partitions input rows based on their current hilite status.

fullDescription.intro: This node separates hilited from non-hilited rows in the input data according to their hilite status at the time of node's execution. Both tables are then passed to outports. Note, hilite changes that happen after the execution are not reflected in the output tables. You will need to reset and execute the node again if you want to get a partitioning based on the changed state.

ports.outPort: The filtered output table containing hilited rows only.
The filtered output table containing non-hilited rows only.
